tool_description: Notify, a new messaging and notification platform for a user friendly and faster communication in B2B & B2C
name: Notify.eu
title: Notify.eu

api_list.name: Send notifications
api_list.description: The one and only API for sending notifications over email, sms, push, slack, ...
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://notify-eu.p.rapidapi.com/notification/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "notify-eu.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://notify-eu.p.rapidapi.com/notification/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "notify-eu.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
